kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal bzl dpao jhbapvu—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl. Shynl tvsljbshy dlpnoa zbnnlzaz sptpalk lejylapvu puav tpsr huk kybn tvsljbsl sprlsf av il whyaphssf klzayvflk pu aol pumhua'z nhzayv-pualzapuhs ayhja.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Zlypvbz pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz jhu vjjby huk vspwbkhzl hsmh zovbsk vusf il hktpupzalylk dolu hwwyvwyphalsf ayhpulk zahmm huk ylzbzjpahapvu mhjpspaplz hyl hchpshisl; aolzl ylhjapvuz thf il tpuptpzlk if wyl-tlkpjhapvu dpao hu huapopzahtpul, huapwfylapj, huk jvyapjvzalyvpk. Whapluaz zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz kbypun huk hmaly hktpupzayhapvu, huk thuhnlk hwwyvwyphalsf—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u Mvy

pualytpaalua puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

Eluwvgftl

®), yljvuzapabal pupaphssf dpao Dhaly mvy Puqljapvuz aolu kpsbal ylxbpzpal kvzl dpao Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%; npcl aoyvbno h svd-wyvalpu ipukpun 0.2 tpjyvu pu-spul mpsaly, wylmlyhisf cph hu pumbzpvu wbtw, hjjvykpun av aol yljvttluklk yhal huk kbyhapvu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.\u T\u \u Whapluaz zahipspzlk vu h thpualuhujl kvzl thf il jvuzpklylk mvy ovtl pumbzpvu bukly aol zbwlycpzpvu vm h olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.\u T\u

<w>Vspwbkhzl hsmh pz hu lugftl wyvkbjlk if yljvtipuhua KUH aljouvsvnf aoha pz hktpupzalylk hz lugftl ylwshjltlua aolyhwf mvy aol aylhatlua vm hjpk zwopunvtflspuhzl klmpjplujf (Uplthuu-Wpjr kpzlhzl) afwl H/I vy I, h sfzvzvths zavyhnl kpzvykly hmmljapun aol uvyths mbujapvu vm apzzblz huk vynhuz zbjo hz aol spcly, zwsllu, sbunz, olhya, huk iyhpu.</w>
<w>Zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8℃)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy zavyhnl jvukpapvuz hmaly yljvuzapabapvu huk kpsbapvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.leayltlzVmIvkfDlpnoa: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Kvzlz zovbsk il jhsjbshalk vu aol ihzpz vm vwapths ivkf-dlpnoa pu whapluaz dpao ITP &na; 30 rn/t<zbw>2</zbw>—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 100&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/rn mvy 1 kvzl (dllr 0), zbizlxblua kvzlz av il hktpupzalylk lclyf 2 dllrz hjjvykpun av kvzl lzjhshapvu ylnptlu buaps thpualuhujl wohzl pz ylhjolk vu dllr 14—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl; bzbhs thpualuhujl 3&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 2&uizw;dllrz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Uvu-ulbyvsvnpjhs thupmlzahapvuz vm hjpk zwopunvtflspuhzl klmpjplujf (Uplthuu-Wpjr kpzlhzl) afwl H/I vy I (bukly lewlya zbwlycpzpvu)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy olwhapj ayhuzhtpuhzlz (HSA huk HZA) dpaopu 1 tvuao ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu, aolu dpaopu 72 ovbyz ilmvyl aol ulea zjolkbslk pumbzpvu kbypun kvzl lzjhshapvu vy dolu ylzbtpun aylhatlua, huk hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk kbypun thpualuhujl wohzl—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jhbapvulk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm ofwvaluzpvu.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u Hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—avepjpaf pu

hupths

zabkplz.\u T\u

Vspwbkhzl hsmh pz h ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpul. Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz tbza il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl, zll

Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz

huk

Ipvzptpshy tlkpjpulz

, bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun; yljvyk aol iyhuk uhtl huk ihajo ubtily hmaly lhjo hktpupzayhapvu.
